Define the task to achieve, including specific requirements, constraints, and success criteria.
Be clear and concise in your instructions to ensure accurate understanding and execution.
Provide any necessary context or background information that may assist in completing the task effectively.
Use structured formatting (e.g., bullet points, numbered lists) to organize complex instructions.
Avoid ambiguity by specifying exact expectations and desired outcomes.
Ensure to include any relevant deadlines or timeframes for task completion.
Encourage asking clarifying questions if any part of the task is unclear.
Maintain a professional and respectful tone throughout the instructions.
Prioritize tasks based on importance and urgency, if applicable.
Review the instructions thoroughly before beginning the task to ensure full comprehension.
Stay focused on the defined task and avoid deviating into unrelated areas.
Remember to document progress and report back upon completion or if any issues arise.
Be mindful of resource limitations and work within the provided constraints.
Promote collaboration and communication if the task involves multiple stakeholders.
Emphasize quality and accuracy in the execution of the task.
The stack being used is Next.js with TypeScript, ESLint, Tailwind CSS. Use simple and modern coding practices. Database should be hosted in the server.
